channel.title: Owner of Moparscape must read! or mods of mopar! everyone should!
channel.description:
Ok, theres a man/girl/boy/women whatever got mad at servers and putting in names and trying to mess servers up for example Progjex-scape.no-ip.org, port: 7965, is one of them servers being bugged by this pathetic person and has some kind of anti-ban so he/she can still play on that server(s). I personally witnessed it over ten times on many servers ecspecially Progjex-scape. Thee ip of the error person (once again he or she) is " adsl-75-47-129-167.dsl.lsan03.sbcglobal.net ". If there is anyway you can permantly ban him from Moparscape than I would more than likely enjoy it or if you could find out how to ipban him/her from progjex-scape.no-ip.org because "Owner Fellixmbc (aka Archer) also is getting annoyed by it.
Thanks much, Garrett

item.title: Owner of Moparscape must read! or mods of mopar! everyone should!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

MoparScape forums are irrelevant to hosting Private Servers themselves, other than the coding and discussion of them. If you have a problem with a server, you have to deal with it. Sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: Owner of Moparscape must read! or mods of mopar! everyone should!

item.title: Owner of Moparscape must read! or mods of mopar! everyone should!
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

This will get locked… And no… You can’t ban someone from every server unless every owner added them to their IP ban list…

Read full topic
